message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100, as it's worth more to me. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $105 out of this deal.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my previous offer of $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
